Text: Hi djfred.  I love your postings - keep up the good work !  I am curious though - why do you leave in all the extras ?  They only end up squeezing picture quality from of the main movie while adding very little value.  Since most movies on their own take up about 4G, do you think you could leave the extras out ?
walther997 and strangerbarry: I'm hjsn1, and you're welcome. Also, I do take the extras out of my personal dvd's but I tried that on here but no one liked it so I don't do it anymore.
